title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1339/1999 of 24 June 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 1374/98 laying down detailed rules for the application of the import arrangements and opening tariff quotas for milk and milk products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1339/1999
of 24 June 1999
amending Regulation (EC) No 1374/98 laying down detailed rules for the application of the import arrangements and opening tariff quotas for milk and milk products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 June 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
